The same diamonds can be dragged to merge and upgrade. Merge to successful will get bonus scores.
Each success of merge can extend spaces at once. Click on th treasure box to speed up the generation.
Mini-Niffler will steal gems and you'll be cut 50 points each time. Successful merge ${##} times, you will complete the game, the left time has bonus. Let'a practice now!
<size=45><outline color=#fbfffe width=2><color=#173f47>Click on the box to turn into a gem.</c></outline></size>

<size=45><outline color=#fbfffe width=2><color=#173f47>Click on the box below 
to quickly generate.</c></outline></size>

<size=45><outline color=#fbfffe width=2><color=#173f47>Mini-Niffler will be killed by 5 attacks
in its adjacent position.</c></outline></size>

<size=45><outline color=#fbfffe width=2><color=#173f47>Attack Mini-Niffler to death <color=#ffd200><outline color=#835431 width=3>+200</outline></c>.
It will be reborn 5 seconds after death,
during that the merge score <color=#ffd200><outline color=#835431 width=3>doubles</outline></c>.</c></outline></size>

<color=#ffd200><outline color=#835431 width=3>Well done!</outline></c>
<size=45><outline color=#fbfffe width=2><color=#173f47>Let's begin out game!</c></outline></size>
